mapper.update: update company set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, city, version from company
